title: Gnar cannot use W to transform if he upgraded it during his transformation
body:
If you level up Ganr's W while transforming, you cannot cast it (grayed out). 

See video below (around 10 sec in):
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vD3f_14acPc


I tested it in a custom game after, and confirmed it only happens with his W.

replies.body: Thank you for the report! The video was extremely useful! Sending it off to the right team.
Good to hear! Hope to see it in the patch notes! :D

Ever, or just in that one instance of transformation?

Pretty big bug regardless, good catch.
Just during the instance of transformation. I could cast it normally after the transformation completed.
